description: Integrated Open edX into a React/Django platform, built learner tools (AI resume builder, chrome extension job tracker), improved async file uploads, and maintained internal reporting apps.
Redesigned checkout components using React and Next.js; integrated Klaviyo with a C# backend to modernize email workflows.
Helped build an MVP with Next.js and Go; set up CI/CD and Playwright tests; supported a successful company pivot and onboarding process.
Led development of a CRM replacing legacy systems; worked on React, Go, GCP, and serverless pipelines for data cleanup and analysis.
Built robotics simulation tools, chatbots, and infrastructure for deploying full-stack apps with Kubernetes, Docker, and AWS.
Worked on legacy CRM modernization with Django and AngularJS; built various microservices including a Facebook chatbot and currency exchange APIs.
